constraints.human: If the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT contain nested Resources

description: An order or request for both supply of the medication and the instructions for administration of the medication to a patient.

constraints.human: If the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT contain nested Resources

MedicationRequest.definition: An order or request for both supply of the medication and the instructions for administration of the medication to a patient.
MedicationRequest.short: Ordering of medication for patient or group

MedicationRequest.id.definition: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource.

MedicationRequest.intent.definition: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, or an original order.
MedicationRequest.intent.short: proposal | plan | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option

MedicationRequest.medicationCodeableConc.definition: Identifies the medication being requested. This is a link to a resource that represents the medication which may be the details of the medication or simply an attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.

MedicationRequest.medicationReference.definition: Identifies the medication being requested. This is a link to a resource that represents the medication which may be the details of the medication or simply an attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.

binding.description: A coded concept specifying the state of the prescribing event. Describes the lifecycle of the prescription.

MedicationRequest.status.definition: A code specifying the current state of the order.
MedicationRequest.status.short: active | on-hold | cancelled | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | draft | unknown

MedicationRequest.subject.definition: A link to a resource representing the person or set of individuals to whom the medication will be given.
MedicationRequest.subject.short: Who or group medication request is for

name: MedicationRequest
title: MedicationRequest
